                                  org.springframework.web.servlet.tags.form.PasswordInputTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IterationTag, JspTag, Tag, TryCatchFinally, EditorAwareTag
public class PasswordInputTag
extends InputTag

Databinding-aware JSP tag for rendering an HTML 'input' element with a 'type' of 'password'.

Since:
2.0
Author:
Rob Harrop, Rick Evans
See Also:
Serialized Form
